rules.prepare:
cd "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR" autoreconf -vfi
# this is necesary for ffi lib loading to work if [ "$BOLT_BUILD_FOR" = "tools" ]; then sed -i 's@paths = \["/usr/local/lib", "/usr/lib"\]@paths = ["/tools/local/lib", "/tools/lib"]@' \ Lib/ctypes/util.py fi
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" $BOLT_SOURCE_DIR/configure \ --prefix="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" \ --build="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --host="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --enable-shared \ --enable-ipv6 \ --enable-unicode=ucs4 \ --with-computed-gotos \ --without-ensurepip \ --with-system-expat \ --with-system-ffi \ --with-dbmliborder=bdb:gdbm
rules.install:
for ENTRY in all libpython2.7-dev python2.7-venv; do mkdir -p "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$ENTRY" done
FULL_INSTALL="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/all"
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" make DESTDIR="$FULL_INSTALL" install
rm -f "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/"*idle* rm -fr "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/python2.7/idlelib" rm -fr "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/python2.7/turtledemo"
cp "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR/Tools/i18n/pygettext.py" \ "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/pygettext2.7" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/pydoc" \ "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/pydoc2.7" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/2to3" \ "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/2to3-2.7" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/python2.7/config/libpython2.7.a" \ "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib" ln -sf ../../libpython2.7.a \ "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/python2.7/config/libpython2.7.a" ln -sf ../../libpython2.7.so \ "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/python2.7/config/libpython2.7.so" ln -sf libpython2.7.so.1.0 \ "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/libpython2.7.so.1" ln -sf ../lib/python2.7/pdb.py \ "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/pdb2.7"
cd "$FULL_INSTALL" find . -type d -a \( -name "test" -o -name "tests" \) -prune -exec rm -fr '{}' ';' find . -type f -a -name "*.egg-info" -exec rm -f '{}' ';'
# ------------------------------------------------------------------------- PKG_PATH="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/libpython2.7-dev" # -------------------------------------------------------------------------
install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin" install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/python2.7"
mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX"/bin/python2.7*-config \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/include" \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/pkgconfig" \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/python2.7"/config \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/python2.7/" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/"libpython2.7*.a \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/"libpython2.7*.so \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/"
